ABOUT

A skateboard is a simple object. It’s comprised of a deck to stand on, wheels, and trucks (axles). Despite its fundamental simplicity, skateboarding is expansive. It’s in counter-culture/culture and in high/low society. It gives space to those who want it.



Skateboarding is often playfully irreverant and casual. It doesn’t have to be taken seriously, especially because all it requires is those prior three components.



is an unwarranted deconstruction of the skateboard, exploring how far its definition can be stretched. In doing this, I plan to use my inevitable failures, processes, and thoughts as an ongoing resource and exploration of how to make skateboards, and how much sawdust one can injest.

PROCESS

ALL PROJECTS

THE POPSICLE THE COUCH THE CHAIR THE CHAIR? THE CART THE BED THE TV THE THRONE THE CROWBAR THE SIGN THE RAMP SUGGEST ONE!

ABOUT

A skateboard is a simple object. It’s comprised of a deck to stand on, wheels, and trucks (axles). Despite its fundamental simplicity, skateboarding is expansive. It’s in counter-culture/culture and in high/low society. It gives space to those who want it.



Skateboarding is often playfully irreverant and casual. It doesn’t have to be taken seriously, especially because all it requires is those prior three components.



is an unwarranted deconstruction of the skateboard, exploring how far its definition can be stretched. In doing this, I plan to use my inevitable failures, processes, and thoughts as an ongoing resource and exploration of how to make skateboards, and how much sawdust one can injest.
